results.title: Atenolol in children with ventricular arrhythmias.
results.text_hl: Twenty children and adolescents treated orally with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ for chronic @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Paroxysmal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013614 @@@paroxysmal ventricular tachycardia@@@ (n = 10) or @DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@Long QT Syndrome@@@ (n = 10) over a 5 year period were retrospectively evaluated to ascertain the efficacy of @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmia@@@ suppression, the effective dosage, the cardiovascular effects, and the incidence of adverse effects.

citations.NLM: Trippel DL, Gillette PC. Atenolol in children with ventricular arrhythmias. Am Heart J. 1990 Jun;119(6):1312-6. PMID: 2353617
citations.BibTeX: @article{2353617, title={Atenolol in children with ventricular arrhythmias.}, author={Trippel DL and Gillette PC}, journal={Am Heart J}, volume={119}, number={6}, pages={1312-6}}
